lines.dialogueText: Hail, traveler! Looking to trade or learn the trade?
Set your price high enough to earn, low enough to move. Balance, always.
But don’t be afraid to haggle. It’s not war—it’s dance. Know when to yield, and when to stand firm.
Never cheat a man. A coin earned in honesty returns in plenty. A coin earned in deceit brings ruin.
Trade is trust. Guard your name more than your gold.
